Powered by the world's most advanced AI models: GPT, Claude, and Gemini.
Enjoy a Max Plan free for one year
Free unlimited transcription for the first year. You'll receive 400 free transcription minutes every month starting from Year 2.

settings.heading: How do I use the UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder?

settings.text: For a detailed tutorial on using the UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder, please refer to this User Manual.

settings.heading: How does the transcription service work after the first year?

settings.text: After your free first year of unlimited transcription on the Max Plan, you'll receive 400 free transcription minutes every month on the Starter Plan.

settings.heading: What are the pricing options if I exceed 400 minutes per month starting from Year 2?

settings.text:
Starting from Year 2, if you exceed your 400 free monthly minutes, you can choose from the following two options:

Option 1: Upgrade to a Paid Plan (Unlimited Minutes)
You can subscribe to the Pro or Max plan to enjoy unlimited monthly transcription minutes:
Pro Plan: $2.5/month (Billed Annually)
Max Plan: $5.83/month (Billed Annually)

Option 2: Purchase Minute Packs (Stay on Starter Plan)
You can remain on the Starter Plan and purchase affordable transcription minute packs (valid for 2 years):
120 minutes — $0.59
600 minutes — $2.59
3000 minutes — $10.99
6000 minutes — $19.99

settings.heading: How accurate is the AI transcription?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus achieves an accuracy rate of over 99% for transcription under optimal conditions. Accuracy may vary slightly depending on factors such as background noise, speaker clarity, and accents. Our advanced AI noise cancellation technology significantly enhances accuracy even in challenging environments such as cafés or busy offices.

settings.heading: What languages are supported for transcription and translation?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus supports transcription and translation in 140+ languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese (including Mandarin and Cantonese), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Hindi, and many more. The app is regularly updated to improve accuracy and add support for additional languages.

settings.heading: How long does the battery last?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus features a 400 mAh rechargeable battery providing up to 40 hours of continuous recording on a single charge. In standby mode, it lasts up to 60 days. The device charges fully in approximately 1.5 hours via the included USB charging cable.

settings.heading: What file formats does the recorder support?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus supports standard audio formats such as MP3 and WAV. Transcribed text can be exported as TXT, DOCX, or PDF files for easy use across various devices and applications.

settings.heading: What is the storage capacity of the UMEVO Note Plus?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus comes with 64GB of built-in storage.

settings.heading: What app is used with the UMEVO Note Plus?
Does the UMEVO Note Plus support Bluetooth?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus requires an app and Bluetooth connection; Bluetooth must remain enabled during pairing.

settings.heading: How can I track the shipping status of my UMEVO Note Plus order?

settings.text: Click "Track Order" in the menu bar to check the shipping status of your UMEVO Note Plus order.

settings.heading: What kind of AI technology powers the transcription and summarization?

settings.text: The advanced AI transcription and summarization is developed with ChatGPT and other models, featuring multiple professional templates and built-in translation functionality.

settings.heading: Who are the typical users of UMEVO Note Plus?

settings.text:
UMEVO Note Plus is used by over 1 million working professionals, many of which rely heavily on meetings and conversations, including roles such as:

Executives

Managers

Sales

Lawyers

Consultants

Educators

settings.heading: Is the UMEVO Note Plus suitable for professionals?

settings.text: Yes, it is perfectly suited for workplace professionals, medical professionals, legal workers, journalists, teachers, students, sales representatives, content creators, and over 100 other professions.

settings.heading: How is UMEVO Note Plus better than using a phone app?

settings.text:
UMEVO Note Plus provides many advantages over recording with your smartphone, including:

Extended Battery: Up to 40 hours of continuous recording with UMEVO Note Plus.

Long Range Capture: State of the art microphones capture clear audio from greater distances.

Convenient Form Factor: One press to record makes it extremely easy and seamless to start capturing conversations. With a phone, the experience looks like: Pausing the conversation to pull out the phone Unlocking the phone Opening the recording app If you switch apps or get a phone call, the recording stops

Summary Templates: UMEVO Note Plus automatically transcribes and summarizes your conversations with AI. You can build your own custom summary template, or pick from thousands of professional summary templates for every use case and industry.

settings.heading: How is UMEVO Note Plus better than the online notetakers like Microsoft Copilot or Google Meets?

settings.text:
UMEVO Note Plus is designed for universal professional coverage across all scenarios:

UMEVO Note Plus captures every conversation, not just online conferencing—in-person meetings, phone calls, and even conference keynotes.

Dedicated hardware provides 10x more convenience and avoids disruption vs. launching a computer/phone application in an in-person setting

Create your own custom summary template or pick from 10,000+ professional summary templates tailored precisely to your professional role or industry

settings.heading: Can UMEVO Note Plus record in larger spaces?

settings.text: Yes, UMEVO Note Plus is engineered to record effectively in larger spaces such as big meeting rooms, lecture halls, and conferences.

settings.heading: How can I locate the Serial Number (SN) of UMEVO Note Plus?

settings.text: The Serial Number is a unique identifier that is utilized to identify and distinguish devices. It is commonly used for product management, device maintenance, and warranty services.If you're searching for the Serial Number (SN) of your UMEVO Note Plus, Open the UMEVO Note Plus app and enter the device settings page. The SN is displayed on this page.

settings.heading: What is the difference between NOTE recording mode and CALL recording mode?

settings.text:
NOTE recording mode applies to many scenarios: meetings, voice memos, interviews, lectures, medical and so on. CALL recording mode is used to record a phone call.

The UMEVO Note Plus needs to be attached to the back of your phone because the internal vibration conduction sensor needs to pick up sound directly from the phone's speaker itself.
